title: Chat help wiped out all of my available networks and made my phone not work at all. After no solution was offered except ordering a phone and waiting 7 to 9 days with a hold on my credit card I asked for a supervisor. I was told one would email me. 24hours later and no response at all. How can I get customer service and my problems fixed? So far all I have heard is what they Can't do....Help>>>>
content: Get my phone to work and my saved networks back (Wiped out by Google agent)
